QuestData.Title: Battle for the Skies
QuestData.Description: Dafeng, the spirit of air, is terrified by Zhao-Ren, the Onyx Serpent. We must help him face that fear, or face it for him ourselves.$B$BWhen I told Ji of the serpent, he said he had an idea and would begin preparations outside of the chamber. Despite his rash nature, I must admit, I envy his passion and conviction.$B$BLet us go outside and confront the Onyx Serpent.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Zhao-Ren, the Onyx Serpent with the aid of Ji's fireworks.
QuestData.RewardText: You have helped Dafeng, the spirit of air, find his courage! The final spirit has been restored.
